thread.title: Granderson, Mets beat Dodgers 13-7, take 2-1 lead in NLDS
thread.title_full: Granderson, Mets beat Dodgers 13-7, take 2-1 lead in NLDS

title: Granderson, Mets beat Dodgers 13-7, take 2-1 lead in NLDS
text: > Top News Granderson, Mets beat Dodgers 13-7, take 2-1 lead in NLDS Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw (22) glances at Los Angeles Dodgers' Chase Utley (26) as the crowd boos Utley during baseline introductions for baseball's Game 3 of the National League Division Series against the New York Mets, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in New York. Utley was disciplined for sliding hard into New York Mets' Ruben Tejada in Game 2, causing Tejada to break his leg. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens)
